info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 8:29PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henderson, southwestern Des Moines and northeastern Lee Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 828 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Iowa Army Ammunition Plant, or near Burlington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Burlington around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Gulf Port and Carman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
